00020 M_INLINE const char *QUERYSTRING_find(QUERYSTRING *query, const char *name )
00021 {
00022    HASHNAMEVALUE *value;
00023 
00024    value = (HASHNAMEVALUE *) HASH_find( &query->name_to_value, (void *) name, -1 );
00025    if (value) {
00026      return value->value;
00027    }
00028    return 0;
00029 }
